# LibraryPlaylistFilter

**Protocol**

Playlist properties your app uses as a filter for a library request.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol LibraryPlaylistFilter
```

## Instance Properties

- **id**: The unique identifier for the playlist.
- **name**: The name of the playlist.

items.description: The unique identifier for the playlist.
items.name: id
